/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.title: zitadel helm release
/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.name: zitadel
/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.doc: Zitadel is an identity management platform which has the best of Auth0 and Keycloack combined. It's built for the serverless era.

0:
[[runners]]
  [runners.kubernetes]
    cpu_request = "500m"
    cpu_limit = "1"
    memory_request = "200Mi"
    memory_limit = "1Gi"
    service_cpu_request = "100m"
    service_cpu_limit = "1"
    service_memory_request = "50Mi"
    service_memory_limit = "1Gi"
    helper_cpu_request = "5m"
    helper_cpu_limit = "500m"
    helper_memory_request = "50Mi"
    helper_memory_limit = "200Mi"
    [runners.kubernetes.node_selector]
      "kubernetes.io/arch" = "amd64"
1:
[[runners]]
  environment = ["FF_GITLAB_REGISTRY_HELPER_IMAGE=true"]
  builds_dir = "/builds"
  [runners.feature_flags]
    FF_USE_ADVANCED_POD_SPEC_CONFIGURATION = true
  [runners.kubernetes]
    node_selector_overwrite_allowed = ".*"
    image = "alpine:latest"
    privileged = true
    # build container
    cpu_limit = "600m"
    memory_limit = "1Gi"
    # service containers
    service_cpu_limit = "600m"
    service_memory_limit = "1Gi"
    # helper container
    helper_cpu_limit = "600m"
    helper_memory_limit = "200Mi"
    [[runners.kubernetes.volumes.host_path]]
      name = "devices"
      host_path = "/dev"
      mount_path = "/dev"
      read_only = true
    [[runners.kubernetes.pod_spec]]
      name = "ephemeral-builds"
      patch_type = "strategic"
      patch = '''
        containers:
        - name: build
          volumeMounts:
          - name: builds
            mountPath: /builds
        - name: helper
          volumeMounts:
          - name: builds
            mountPath: /builds
        volumes:
        - name: builds
          ephemeral:
            volumeClaimTemplate:
              spec:
                accessModes: [ ReadWriteOnce ]
                resources:
                  requests:
                    storage: 8Gi
    '''
    [[runners.kubernetes.volumes.empty_dir]]
      name = "docker-certs"
      mount_path = "/certs/client"
      medium = "Memory"
  # [runners.cache]
  #   Type = "gcs"
  #   Path = "runner"
  #   Shared = true
  #   [runners.cache.gcs]
  #     BucketName = "gitlab-runner-cache-lxsj5esx"
